description: These cute little text faces are hugging each other or, in some cases, they are about to hug each other. These are either hugs between friends, family, couples, or even a group of friends! Usually these emoticons have happy expressions but not always, which makes for some pretty hilarious looking hugs. Add in some hearts to make these hugs more loving.
